
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52090545">
<font color="#535861"><font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot"><font size="5">中医界独树一帜的火神派，因注重人身真阳，且善用姜、附而得名，</font></font></font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><br>
<font color="#535861"><font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot"><font size="5">咸奉蜀南临邛郑钦安为鼻祖，所著《医理真传》、《医法圆通》、《伤寒恒论》为此派开山之作。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#535861"><font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot"><font size="5"><br>
